name: Defense Clicker
description: Defense Clicker is an clicker game which will be soon F2P, with an tower defense theme and a few twists which make it very unique. You have to build an defense line with towers and upgrade them to stay alive as long as possible. when you die the map resets but you get a few special points depending on how long you survived.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Quadcore or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Quadcore or higher
